      • nextValidInt

        public static int nextValidInt​(java.util.Scanner sc,
                               java.lang.String invalidInputMessage,
                               java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Integer> condition)
        The next valid integer from sc that satisfies the given predicate. Between invalid inputs, invalidInputMessage is printed.
        Parameters:
        sc - the scanner from which to request the input.
        invalidInputMessage - the message to print between invalid input attempts.
        condition - the condition that constitutes a valid integer input.
        Returns:
        the next valid integer input from sc.

        public static java.lang.String nextValid​(java.util.Scanner sc,
                                         java.lang.String invalidInputMessage,
                                         java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> condition)
        The next valid String from sc that satisfies the given predicate. Between invalid inputs, invalidInputMessage is printed.

        condition - the condition that constitutes a valid String input.

      • validInput

        public static <T> T validInput​(java.util.Scanner sc,
                               java.util.function.Predicate<T> predicate,
                               java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,​T> isValid,
                               java.lang.String invalidInputMessage)
        The next valid input from sc that matches the given predicate and does not throw in its isValid generator function. Between invalid inputs, invalidInputMessage is printed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the desired type produced in isValid from the String input.
        Parameters:
        sc - the scanner from which to request the input.
        predicate - the predicate that must be satisfied by the output of isValid to constitute a valid input.
        isValid - the function that converts the String input from scanner to the desired type. If an exceptionis thrown the input is classified as invalid and is requested again from sc.
        invalidInputMessage - the message to print between invalid input attempts.
        Returns:
        the next valid value of type T that does not throw and satisfies the given predicate when produced froma String input from sc in isValid.

      • validInput

        public static <T> T validInput​(java.util.Scanner sc,
                               java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,​T> isValid,
                               java.lang.String invalidInputMessage)
        The next valid input from sc that does not throw in its isValid generator function. Between invalid inputs, invalidInputMessage is printed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the desired type produced in isValid from the String input.
        Parameters:
        sc - the scanner from which to request the input.
        isValid - the function that converts the String input from scanner to the desired type. If an exceptionis thrown the input is classified as invalid and is requested again from sc.
        invalidInputMessage - the message to print between invalid input attempts.
        Returns:
        the next valid value of type T that does not throw when produced from a String input from sc in isValid.

        public static final <Element> boolean contains​(Element element,

        Returns a boolean value indicating whether an element is contained within an array.

        Parameters:
        element - the element being searched for in arr.
        arr - the array being searched for element.
        Returns:

        element - the short being searched for in arr.
        arr - the array of short values being search for element.
        Returns:
        true if element is contained within arr, otherwise returns false.

      • underlined

        public static java.lang.String underlined​(java.lang.String str)
        Returns a string with the combining low line character (U+0332) inserted under each character of str.
        Parameters:
        str - the String to return underlined.
        Returns:
        a String of str underlined.

      • graphemeClustersCount

        The number of grapheme clusters in a given a string.
        Parameters:
        of - the string to count the grapheme clusters of.
        Returns:
        the number of grapheme clusters in the string.

      • padLeft

        public static java.lang.String padLeft​(java.lang.String str,
                                       int toLength)
        Pads the string to the specified amount on the left.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to pad.
        toLength - the to length to pad str to.
        Returns:
        a String of str padded to the desired length on the left.

      • padRight

        public static java.lang.String padRight​(java.lang.String str,
                                        int toLength)
        Pads the string to the specified amount on the right.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to pad.
        toLength - the to length to pad str to.
        Returns:
        a String of str padded to the desired length on the right.

      • padCentered

        public static java.lang.String padCentered​(java.lang.String str,
                                           int toLength)
        Pads the string to the specified amount. Padding is distributed evenly on both sides of the string.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to pad.
        toLength - the to length to pad str to.
        Returns:
        a String of str padded to the desired length, with the extra padding on either side of str.
